text: Footprint in the Ocean () is a 1964 Soviet adventure movie directed by Oleg Nikolayevsky.СЛЕД В ОКЕАНЕ (1964)След в океане It stars Ada Sheremetyeva, Yuri Dedovich, and Yevgeny Vesnik. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1964 movies Category:Soviet adventure movies
title: Footprint in the Ocean
